justification: The article states: "Personality trait. Based on the Ten-Item Personality Inventory (TIPI) (Gosling, Rentfrow, Swann, 2003)."

measured_by: Terracciano et al. (2005) national Big Five dataset
justification: "Personality traits. Big Five personality traits at the country level are based on Terracciano et al. (2005)."
"Community Mobility Reports (Google LLC, 2020)... Mobility measure records the percent change in total number of visitors to places..."

measured_by: International Survey on Coronavirus item ‘I stayed at home’
justification: "We took the responses ... to questions regarding near past behaviour: 'I stayed at home' ... as indicating mobility in the past."

measured_by: International Survey on Coronavirus binary question ‘Do you need to leave your home in the next 5 days?’
justification: "Propensity to leave home in the near future is captured by the binary response (Yes or No) to the question: 'Do you need to leave your home in the next 5 days?'"
